General.Name: PGF Capital Bhd
General.Description: PGF Capital Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in fiber glasswool and related products primarily in Malaysia, rest of Southern East Asia, Oceania, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Fibre Glasswool and Related Products, Property Development, and Investment Holding segments. The company offers radiant barriers, adhesives, and ceiling and roof systems; and melt blown fabric used in personal hygiene, roofing, carpeting, upholstery, and medical product applications. It also develops a country retreat comprising bungalow lots and orchard lots; invests in shares; and engages in letting of properties, as well as engages in plantation of tropical fruits and aquaculture activities. The company was formerly known as Poly Glass Fibre (M) Bhd and changed its name to PGF Capital Berhad in January 2022. PGF Capital Berhad was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Perai, Malaysia.
